name: Fightz!
description:
Fightz! is a up to 4 player 2D fighting game inspired by the likes of Duck Game and Super Smash Bros

Credits

I used Cypor's tile set for the ground and trees

I used Industrial Zone Tile set for a level 

I used Swamp Game Tile set for a level

Nectanebo’s menu buttons will be used for a menu

qubodup's Loading Icons were used for loading bars

Kelvin Shadewing's letters were used to write the name of the game on the title

qubodup's success sound was used for winning a level
